title: Is this a 1950 women's magazine to shoot "predatory reptiles"?
subtitle: Announcing the ancient women's magazine of Colt Cobra's gun to be used against that perverted stranger who won't leave you alone.
author: David Emery
vclaim: A magazine announcement from the 1950s called a gun to use women with the slogan "So weird, perverted infiltrator who won't leave you alone."
